I don’t hear them either.
[/quote]Excuse me, what?

Read Lin’s post again and think about it…[/quote]

Aloud is the wrong word; the word was allowed. Just incase you didn’t get it.
Post evidense if it’s a virus and Report it to a moderator.

item.description:
@Sideways_8 wrote:

If you put these files together in the .RAR you need to be banned, immediately, because it has a virus in it, the .RAR archive is set to auto extract 3 of the 7 files included in it to your wndows directory, and their not helpful files -.- GG fail haxor.
